objects.description: In the Ukraine 2015 Incident, [Sandworm Team](https://collaborate.mitre.org/attackics/index.php/Group/G0007) blocked command messages by using malicious firmware to render communication devices inoperable.(Citation: ICS SANS Ukraine March 2018)

external_references.description: Electricity Information Sharing and Analysis Center; SANS Industrial Control Systems. (2016, March 18). Analysis of the Cyber Attack on the Ukranian Power Grid: Defense Use Case. Retrieved March 27, 2018.
